summary: For spouses of military service members, finding or keeping a job is a top concern. This Q&A report examines the demographics, employment experiences, and well-being of military spouses who worked part time. Of approximately 270,000 military spouses who were employed, about a third worked part time in 2021, based on our estimates from DOD data. Military spouses we interviewed said they worked part time because...
title: Military Spouse Employment: Part-Time Workforce Characteristics and Perspectives
